IonicSecurity::SDK::RsaKeyGenerator Class Reference

Wrapper class around the C++ RSA key generator class. Implements RSA key generation. More...

Public Member Functions

 Generates an RSA public key. More...
 

Detailed Description

Wrapper class around the C++ RSA key generator class. Implements RSA key generation.

Member Function Documentation

◆ GeneratePrivateKey()

RsaPrivateKey IonicSecurity::SDK::RsaKeyGenerator::GeneratePrivateKey ( System::UInt32  mnKeyLength)

Generates an RSA private key.

Parameters
[in]mnKeyLengthThe bit-length of the RSA key (must be 2048 or 3072).

This function generates an RSA private key with the specified key length. The only supported key lengths are 2048 and 3072.

An SdkException is thrown in the event of an error.

Returns
Returns a private key output object.
See also
RsaKeyPersistor::LoadPrivateKeyBer(array<System::Byte>^ mpbyBuffer),
RsaKeyPersistor::SavePrivateKeyDer(array<System::Byte>^ mpbyBuffer)

◆ GeneratePublicKey()

RsaPublicKey IonicSecurity::SDK::RsaKeyGenerator::GeneratePublicKey ( RsaPrivateKey^  privateKeyIn)

Generates an RSA public key.

Parameters
[in]privateKeyInThe input private key to generate from.

This function generates an RSA public key from the specified private key.

An SdkException is thrown in the event of an error.

Returns
Returns a public key output object.
See also
RsaKeyPersistor::LoadPublicKeyBer(array<System::Byte>^ mpbyBuffer)
RsaKeyPersistor::SavePublicKeyDer(RsaPublicKey^ publicKey)
